result_list: It is the logical step following the policy network which selects the regions for feature extraction, and the diagram suggests the flow of processing to a CNN designed for local features
This follows the selection of image regions so the next step is typically extracting features from these selected regions, which would be the role of a local CNN in the context of the diagram

The diagram and the accompanying text reference a high-capacity CNN to process selected image patches, which implies that this part of the diagram refers to a more powerful CNN applicable after region selection
